intents.question: Aftercare
intents.answer:
Aftercare Instructions for Your Tattoo:

ğŸ©¹ **Initial Application (12-24 hours):**
â€¢ Artist applies first Tegaderm bandage
â€¢ Leave on for 12-24 hours
â€¢ Remove in shower under warm water
â€¢ Wash with antibacterial soap
â€¢ Pat dry with clean paper towel

ğŸ©¹ **Second Application (4-5 days):**
â€¢ Apply new Tegaderm bandage
â€¢ Leave on for 4-5 days
â€¢ Fluid accumulation is normal

ğŸ©¹ **Final Care (After 4-5 days):**
â€¢ Remove bandage in shower
â€¢ Wash with antibacterial soap
â€¢ Air dry completely
â€¢ Apply fragrance-free lotion
â€¢ Avoid soaking until healed

âš ï¸ **Important Notes:**
â€¢ Fluid under bandage is normal
â€¢ Redness/breakouts are normal
â€¢ Protect from sun after healing
â€¢ Follow artist's specific instructions
